pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diagonally Dominant Principal Component Analysis // Efficient procedures for fitting the DD-PCA (Ke et al., 2019, arXiv:1906.00051) by decomposing a large covariance matrix into a low-rank matrix plus a diagonally dominant matrix. The implementation of DD-PCA includes the convex approach using the Alternating Direction Method of Multipliers (ADMM) and the non- convex approach using the iterative projection algorithm. Applications of DD-PCA to large covariance matrix estimation and global multiple testing are also included in this package.
